p: All data were recorded in Excel worksheets (Microsoft Office 2010). Results were analyzed and plotted using both Microsoft Excel and Graph Pad Prism program (Version 6.1). The data presented is at least three independent experiments as mean ± standard deviation. For evaluation of statistical significance, t-test and one-way ANOVA test with Turkey’s multiple comparisons was used and considered p ≤ 0.05 significance level.
